value.title: Make a Table Visualization to Display All Observations from Data Source in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this session, I’m demonstrating how we can show all the records even if it is the same as the Power BI table. We all know that the Power BI table visual automatically removes the duplicate rows from end-users in the table. But sometimes we need to show the end-users all the values from the data source

value.title: Overview of Power BI Apps
value.excerpt: In this video, first we will talk What is a Power BI App? An App is a Power BI content type which allows to combine dashboards, reports all in one place bundled together. value.title: Power BI Tip - Hide Filter Pane From the Published Version of Power BI Report
value.excerpt: In this vlog we will learn about how we can hide the Filter Pane from the published version of the Power BI report. Sometimes there are situations in which we have set our Visual, Page or Report level filter as a part of development logic and we wish that end user should not able to change those values.

value.title: Power BI Tip - Stop Visual Interactions at Report Level in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this vlog we will learn about how we can stop the interaction between the visualization. In Power BI, whenever we select any visual data point, it filters other visuals based on the selected data point. Sometimes there is a requirement, where we don’t need the filtering functionality on selected data

value.title: Power Query Tip - Add Sequential Number using the Index Column in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, we will learn, how we can easily add the sequence for the rows using the PowerQuery. In Power Query we can add the sequence number using the Index. Let’s see how to add the Index column in the Power BI.  If you really like this video don’t forget to subscribe to my channel. ***************

value.title: Table.AddFuzzyClusterColumn Function in Power BI
value.excerpt: During this vLog, we will learn how we can get help with spellings in Power BI using Table.AddFuzzyClusterColumn function in Power BI. value.title: 3 steps to pin Reporting Services visuals to a Power BI Dashboard
value.excerpt: In this video, I show how you can configure Reporting Services to integrate with Power BI and then pin visualizations from a paginated report to a Power BI dashboard.   There are three main steps you have to do to get this to work.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube
